items: Once per map protects you from one hit and then breaks
The Zweihander is an extraordinary and legendary sword known for its imposing size
The straight sword is a sleek and agile weapon designed for swift and precise strikes in close-quarters combat.
A knight's broadsword is a formidable weapon, characterized by its wide blade, ideal for delivering powerful strikes.
A katana is a curved, single-edged sword renowned for its elegance and deadly cutting ability.
A cutlass is a short, curved sword known for its curvature.
a graceful duelist's weapon, swift and deadly in skilled hands
a double-edged masterpiece for the master of the duel
A radiant blade shining with courage, warding off darkness and illuminating the path to victory
a regal blade, adorned with gold, striking fear into the hearts of monarchs
a versatile weapon, reaching out with deadly precision from a warrior's grasp
a formidable weapon, honed for protection and swift counterattacks
a deadly spear, perfect for quick strikes in crowds
crafted from a feeble dragstone, offers limited impact and blunt force
a modest, entry-level weapon with limited cutting power, ideal for novice adventurers
double-headed battle-axe, embodying raw strength and ferocity in every swing
a versatile hand axe, blending the elegance of tradition with the brutality of battle
Guaranteed to make your foes dance like clumsy ballerinas
Basic Bow: Perfect for those who want to be an archer but can't quite hit the broad side of a barn yet
Take your archery skills to new heights with this bow that launches arrows straight to the moon
unleashes arrows imbued with the power of air, striking foes with lightning speed
launching arrows that freeze foes in their tracks, cool down bro!
A magical wand in disguise, this walking stick grants its wielder the power to cast spells
wooden conduit of nature's magic, channeling the essence of the earth and empowering the druid's spells
Harness the infernal forces with this wickedly powerful wand, perfect for those who like to play with fire...and chaos
Unleash the celestial fury of the moon with this versatile wand, carries the elegance of moonlight
A trusty companion crafted from sturdy timber, offering basic protection against foes
A fortress on your arm, this sturdy shield laughs in the face of enemy attacks.
A humble vessel for nourishment, it's also the perfect tool for stylishly bonking enemies on the head
A sacred guardian, this shield bears the emblem of the church, providing unwavering defense against the forces of darkness
A tiny elixir of rejuvenation, this potion mends wounds and revitalizes adventurers
Quench your adventurer's thirst with this magical concoction, instantly restoring all vitality
When you need a little pick-me-up, this magical elixir boosts your spirit
Tap into the arcane energies with this potent elixir, refilling your magical reserves to the top
Adorn yourself with this enchanted amulet, it acts as a conduit for magical energies, granting a greater pool of mana
An artifact with a mind of its own, this celestial gem bestows a random assortment of comical and unpredictable effects upon its bearer.
A fearsome fang extracted from a mighty tiger, this tooth is said to grant its bearer enhanced senses, agility, and a ferocious bite
A grim relic exuding dark energy, this skull holds the tragic tale of a villager cursed with forbidden might. Wielding it harnesses their power, but at what cost
Bestowed by the divine god Heka, this talisman bestows insight and knowledge upon its possessor,
Bestowed by the divine god Eros, this enchanting artifact radiates profound insights into matters of the heart
A humble sheet of ancient parchment, awaiting your quill
A solid block of raw potential, awaiting the skilled hands of a master sculptor to shape it into magnificent works of art or intricate symbols of power.
A gleaming band of precious metal, adorning your finger with elegance and a touch of luxury, Perhaps it holds a hidden enchantment?
A shimmering ring infused with arcane energies, it enhances your mana regeneration and empowers your spellcasting
Adorn your finger with this enchanted ring, pulsing with revitalizing energy accelerating your natural healing
A shimmering band believed to hold the favor of fortune itself. Wear it and see the dice roll in your favor
A gleaming steel guardian for your noble noggin, providing both protection and a sense of chivalrous style on the battlefield
Crafted from nature's bounty, this sturdy headgear blends seamlessly with the wilderness, granting the keen senses of a skilled tracker
An imposing helm adorned with religious symbols, channeling the strength and fervor of crusaders
A majestic headpiece inspired by the Byzantine Empire, blending elegance and formidable defense, fit for a warrior of historical grandeur
Reliable footwear crafted from supple leather, offering comfort and agility
chain links woven together, safeguarding your lower legs with sturdy protection while allowing swift movement on the battlefield
Gilded leg armor that shimmers with opulence, offering both protection and a touch of regal flair as you stride through treacherous terrain
These exquisite footwear, woven from the finest silk, empower bards with effortless grace, allowing their feet to dance
A pointy and iconic accessory worn by witches, imbued with an aura of mystique
A dark and ominous hood, favored by practitioners of the forbidden arts, emanating an aura of death
A simple and practical headwear worn by everyday folk, offering modest protection from the elements
A majestic mane of facial hair, bestowing an air of wisdom, ruggedness, and perhaps a few crumbs from yesterday's meal.
Simple yet reliable, this armor provides essential protection on your journey, shielding you from harm and keeping you ready for whatever lies ahead
The epitome of protection and mobility, this finely-crafted armor ensures the safety of mounted warriors
Majestic and regal, this suit of armor is adorned with intricate designs and forged with the finest craftsmanship, providing unparalleled drip and protection for a ruler.
These gloves offer no protection or practical use whatsoever. They are purely decorative and serve as a reminder to choose your gear wisely
Trusty hand protection, perfect for adventures and keeping your fingers warm while handling swords, treasures, and the occasional sticky situation.
A unique pair of gloves combining various materials, offering a blend of protection, flexibility, and a distinct fashion statement for the eclectic adventurer.
Gauntlets forged with care, these sturdy gloves offer a firm grip on your weapon, protecting your hands
A simple fruit, both a delicious snack and a humble projectile for throwing at enemies when you're feeling a bit cheeky
The epitome of dairy goodness, a delicious and versatile sustenance that can be enjoyed on its own or used to lure hungry creatures.
A regrettable mishap turned weapon, this egg offers a messy and unexpectedly slippery surprise to unsuspecting foes. Handle with care
A delectable treat, capable of magically restoring one's hunger and providing a momentary distraction from the perils of adventuring
A weathered and mysterious key, whispered to unlock the secrets of long-forgotten crypts and grant access to untold treasures or lurking horrors
Unlock the towering heights of a watchtower, This key grants access to a vigilant watchtower, breaks on use.
A flickering source of illumination, providing a comforting glow in the darkest of corners
A resplendent vessel adorned with intricate gold filigree, radiating a regal aura. It holds the power to amplify potions and elixirs, turning water into health
